Title: Darling Nikki
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Franklin jin Rho, Adam Stein, David Grimm (story editor), Alyssa Clark (story editor), Yasemin Yilmaz (staff writer)
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Zuleikha Robinson, Kurt Egyiawan
Plot: Marcus and Tomas are caught in a deadly situation as they attempt to bring a demon out of hiding, which has chosen Rose as its target.
